headline: Invesco Expands Income Products While Committing To US$1b Share Buyback
summary: Invesco (NYSE:IVZ) has launched the Invesco Core Plus Real Estate Trust and four new fixed income ETFs, expanding its product shelf for retirement and bond investors. The company has also approved an expanded share repurchase authorization of up to US$1b. These moves highlight product growth efforts alongside a capital return program focused on share buybacks. For you as an investor, Invesco sits at the crossroads of asset management, retirement savings, and ETF flows, all areas that...
